Steps.Message: Update at 03:23 - Our staff have now confirmed that our substation equipment has operated due to an underground cable fault which we'll need to pinpoint, excavate and repair. We're sending specialist teams and equipment to site, and it's possible they will still be able to restore your power within the current timeframe using other methods. However, once they've further assessed we'll have a better idea of the works required, so we'll let you know if the time frame needs to change. If you would like more information about this type of fault; here's a short video https://bit.ly/2ScxQDZ.

We became aware of a power cut at 22:52. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

We're sending specialist teams and equipment to site, and it's possible they will still be able to restore your power within the current timeframe using other methods. IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
